title: Battle Boss Malzahar Tweak
body: Battle Boss Malzahar is a good skin, but the E is hard to see when cast on a unit. Not only that, but Malzahar players use the sound to know how much time is left on the ability. Would Riot consider updating this animation to be easier to see and the sound to be easier to hear? Thanks.

replies.body: To me it is easier to see and hear than the base skin, if not the same. I would prefer if it was left alone, but it isn't a game changer either way.
